name: Dungeon Protector
description:
Play as a witch in charge of protecting unimaginable riches from the claws of evil adventurers.

This is a turn-based puzzle game, actions are performed by spending action points (AP). Walking costs 1 per tile, stabbing and shield spell cost 2 and the ice spell costs all 3 APs. Enemies get only 2 APs. Everything dies in just one hit, time is limited.

Keys:
Q Go to
W Stab
E Ice spell
R Shield spell
Space End turn
F Show enemy turn order

Good luck & have fun!

A game by:
Simon Reiser | Michael "Mouch" Miedler | Alexius "Neato" Rait
